name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in full stack development, focusing on modern technologies including **React**, **TypeScript**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **PostgreSQL**. Proven expertise in building scalable and secure SaaS applications, leveraging cloud services such as **AWS** and adhering to Agile methodologies. Skilled in implementing CI/CD pipelines and applying software design patterns effectively to optimize development processes.

Demonstrated ability to lead projects with a strong foundation in distributed computing and DevOps practices. Experienced in architecting microservices and event-driven systems to support high-performance solutions in the healthcare and finance sectors. Additionally, I possess a solid background in developing machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows, integrating them seamlessly for predictive analytics and automation.
